title: I work in the Costco Food Court. AMA! : r/Costco - Reddit
body: ispankyi • 8 yr. ago. We have 23 people. I work at a costco in Bay area California. We are slammed all day. We make most of our prep in the morning. About 180 chicken bakes, 120 turkeys and just under 100 salads. Excluding January through march. 10. 84awkm • 8 yr. ago.
